extendedInfo.description: Enjoy the ultimate real-life basketball experience with Real Basketball.Real Basketball is an addictive game designed for basketball fans, which it offers single player or multiplayer options, as well as many fun game modes where you can show off your basketball skills!You can choose to play online with people around the world, or play live games with your friends and earn MP's which can be used towards in-app features.Prepare to experience the joy of playing best basketball game with real people.Express your style by choosing from tens of different characters, basketballs, uniforms and courts.Unlimited fun awaits you with 6 different game modes. Check out the scoreboard in each game mode to see how you ranked.Unlock various achievements to win tens of cups and gain access to extra features.Features:- Realistic 3D graphics- 6 different game modes- Online multi-player game experience with real opponents or your own friends - Surprise interactive experiences- 40 uniforms and unlimited customization- 20 basketballs and surprise features- 4 basketball courts- Cups which can be unlocked through various achievementsKeywords:basket, basketball, real basketball, flick, flick basketball, online, multiplayer, all-star, arcade, shoot, game, sport, hoop, court, rookie

reviews.title: Nice!!!
reviews.comment: Smooth gameplay, no lagging one of the best I\'ve played so far... Great job.
reviews.author: jonathon Powell

reviews.title: Good game.highly good graphics.well done vivid games
reviews.comment: Awesome

reviews.title: A fun and enjoyable game wich you can find friends to play with.
reviews.comment: Fun and enjoyable

reviews.title: Realty good I love the graphics in this game its so cool
reviews.comment: The game is pretty good but the game creator should make American football game

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love this game the graphics are just great and jus cool

reviews.title: Nice one
reviews.comment: Its really good,no lag,and user friendly ths is the game...i really really like.,
reviews.author: Shiela Canoy

reviews.title: A amazing amazing
reviews.comment: Really good game I love how you shoot it can be hard sometimes but when you get the hang of it it\'s pretty fun
reviews.author: Halbert Wilson

reviews.title: Really good!
reviews.comment: This game is really fun and good, definitely worth downloading, but different game modes against cpu wuld make it better.
reviews.author: Evan Davies

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good game, good graphics and lot of fun! Keep up the great work!
reviews.author: S\303\241ndor Csendes

reviews.title: Needs work.
reviews.comment: Too much lag. Online match making sucks. I cant add friends. Chat options would be cool. Character customization and female characters would be nice. Other game improvements. Some achievements are impossible. Score 48 or 66 points. Ridiculous.
reviews.author: Koral Andrews

reviews.title: Enjoyable..
reviews.comment: With a few caveats. Some achievements seem impossible (5x flawless combos). Even when I achieve a 5x flawless combo, I get no achievement. Also, I randomly lose thousands of MP at a time. Frustrating.
reviews.author: Adam Pappastergion

reviews.title: Better than ever!!
reviews.comment: Played and deleted this game before because no updates were done. But now.... im practicing my skills back. Hahaha. Nice one dev team..
reviews.author: Kevin Pagurayan

reviews.title: Can\'t get odd numbers
reviews.comment: Fun game but until they fix the problems with the scoring they won\'t get a higher rating.  There are achievements that require you to score odd points.  How can you do that when everything in basketball in this game is worth even points.  Every update doesn\'t address it. I\'ve posted on the FB page nothing.  And then I just update it the last time and I\'ve lost some of my trophies.  WOW!!! THESE STARS ARE SLOWLY GOING AWAY
reviews.author: John Flynn

reviews.title: Get it if you\'re a fan of the 3 point contest.
reviews.comment: Easy to pick up and play. I got to work on my bank shot. lol
reviews.author: Galib Qureshi

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: This game is by far one of my favorites. I\'d recommend it to people who love basketball and whoever likes games with this setup.
reviews.author: Gabe Moran

reviews.title: INTRUSIVE ADS!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Despite spending REAL money in this game, I\'ve recently started getting horrible and very intrusive ads pop-up on both my screen and in my notification bar various times throughout the day. Very annoyed!
reviews.author: Ryan Butcher

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Awesome game real good graphics players lok a little real so good work real nice games
reviews.author: Santam Nair

reviews.title: Shooter
reviews.comment: It\'s a fun game, but it needs to be fixed. There are times when I\'m playing against another player and they miss but the game still gives them flawless for every miss.
reviews.author: Percy Morton

reviews.title: Do not download.
reviews.comment: This game sucks. They intentionally set it for you to loose your MP on online mode.
reviews.author: Daniel Zirhi

reviews.title: Best basketball game
reviews.comment: Love this game.Graphics are awesome.Easy to play and fun.Download it,what you waiting for?
reviews.author: John Velazquez
